userGuides.title: User Guides
userGuides.description: Comprehensive guides to help you make the most of Group Chat AI
userGuides.welcome: Welcome to the Group Chat AI documentation! These guides will help you get the most out of your AI group chats.

sections.settingUp: Setting Up Your Group Chat Chat
sections.practiceEffectively: Tips for Effective Group Chat Conversations

whatIsGroupChatAI.title: What is Group Chat AI?
whatIsGroupChatAI.description: Group Chat AI is your personal AI group conversation simulator. It creates realistic audience scenarios with AI personas that provide interactive conversations, including interactions with each other and you.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
steps: Configure your group chat conversation on the home page
Select AI personas to represent your audience
Start your session and begin chatting
Interact with personas through text or voice* (*If browser supports native speech-to-text)
Review session summaries for improvement insights

configuringConversations.title: Configuring Group Chat Conversation
configuringConversations.description: Customize your group chat by editing the default scenario or completely writing your own:
items: Title: Name your scenario (e.g., "Q1 Board Presentation")
Conversation Description: Define the context, audience, and objectives
Import/Export: Save and reuse scenarios across sessions

selectingPersonas.title: Selecting AI Personas
selectingPersonas.description: Choose personas that match your target audience:
items: Default Personas: Pre-configured roles like CEO, CTO, Sales Director
Custom Personas: Create personas with specific names, roles, and characteristics
Voice Settings: Configure voice synthesis for each persona

interactionFeatures.title: Interaction Features
interactionFeatures.description: Discover the various ways you can interact with AI personas during your practice sessions.
items: Voice Input: Use speech-to-text for natural conversation
Image Uploads: Share slides or visual materials
Direct Questions: Target specific personas for focused feedback
Real-time Responses: Get immediate reactions and questions

conversationTools.title: Conversation Tools
conversationTools.description: Make the most of the tools available during your group conversation.
items: Chat Export: Save your conversation for review
Message Filtering: View specific types of interactions
Voice Settings: Adjust audio preferences during the chat
Session Summary: Get AI-generated insights and recommendations

bestPractices.title: Best Practices
bestPractices.description: Tips to get the most out of your AI group chats.
items: Be Specific: Create detailed scenarios that match your real context
Use Realistic Personas: Configure personas that reflect your actual audience. The more detail, the better the persona aligns to your expectations.
Practice Regularly: Short, frequent sessions are more effective than long, infrequent ones
Review Summaries: Use AI insights to identify improvement areas
Iterate: Refine your approach based on feedback

commonUseCases.title: Common Use Cases
commonUseCases.description: Examples of howGroup Chat can be used in different professional scenarios.
items: Board Presentations: Practice with executive-level personas
Sales Pitches: Use customer-focused personas with specific objections
Team Updates: Configure peer-level personas for collaborative feedback
Conference Talks: Practice with diverse audience personas

connectionProblems.title: Connection Problems
items: Refresh the page if you see connection errors
Check your internet connection
Clear browser cache if issues persist

voiceNotWorking.title: Voice Features Not Working
items: Ensure microphone permissions are granted
Check browser audio settings
Use Chrome or Edge for best voice support

performanceIssues.title: Performance Issues
items: Close unnecessary browser tabs
Disable browser extensions that might interfere
Use the latest version of your browser

voiceInput.title: Voice Input
voiceInput.description: Group Chat AI supports voice input for natural conversation:
steps: Click the microphone button in the message area
The system will automatically convert speech to text

voiceSynthesis.title: Voice Synthesis
voiceSynthesis.description: Enable voice synthesis to hear persona responses:
steps: Configure voice settings at the start of your session
Assign different voices to each persona
Adjust speech rate and other parameters
Toggle voice on/off during the session

personaCustomization.title: Persona Customization
personaCustomization.description: Create detailed, role-specific personas for targeted practice.
items: Custom names and roles
Detailed background information
Avatar selection
Voice personality mapping

sessionAnalytics.title: Session Analytics
sessionAnalytics.description: Gain insights from your practice sessions.
items: AI-generated summaries
Key insights identification
Improvement recommendations
Progress tracking

contentManagement.title: Content Management
items: Import/export scenarios
Session history
Chat transcripts
Visual material support
